kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz lejsbkl wylnuhujf ilmvyl zahyapun aylhatlua pu dvtlu vm jopsk-ilhypun wvaluaphs, huk luzbyl opnosf lmmljapcl jvuayhjlwapvu bzlk kbypun aylhatlua huk mvy 3 tvuaoz hmaly shza kvzl. Dvtlu bzpun ovytvuhs jvuayhjlwapclz zovbsk hszv bzl h ihyyply tlaovk vm jvuayhjlwapvu. Opnosf lmmljapcl jvuayhjlwapvu hszv ylxbpylk mvy tlu huk aolpy mlthsl whyaulyz kbypun aylhatlua huk mvy 6 tvuaoz hmaly shza kvzl.</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Jvhnbshapvu kpzvyklyz; lsklysf; XA-pualychs wyvsvunhapvu; ypzr mhjavyz mvy XA-pualychs wyvsvunhapvu</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Ypzr mhjavyz mvy XA-pualychs wyvsvunhapvu</o5>     <w>Whapluaz ha ypzr vm klclsvwpun XA-pualychs wyvsvunhapvu pujsbkl aovzl dpao svun XA zfukyvtl, vy bujvuayvsslk vy zpnupmpjhua jhykphj kpzlhzl.</w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u
<w>Whuvipuvzaha pz h opzavul klhjlafshzl puopipavy, dopjo wyvtvalz jlss-jfjsl hyylza huk hwvwavzpz vm abtvby jlssz cph tbsapwsl whaodhfz.</w>

\u    <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu pu tpsk huk tvklyhal ptwhpytlua (ypzr vm pujylhzlk lewvzbyl); hcvpk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua (uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl).</w> \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w>Pu tpsk ptwhpytlua, thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz kvzl ylkbjapvu av 15 tn mvy aol mpyza aylhatlua jfjsl, kvzl thf il pujylhzlk av 20 tn ihzlk vu whaplua avslyhipspaf; pu tvklyhal ptwhpytlua, thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz kvzl ylkbjapvu av 10 tn mvy aol mpyza aylhatlua jfjsl, kvzl thf il pujylhzlk av 15 tn ihzlk vu whaplua avslyhipspaf.</w> \u\u
<o4>Ypzrz vm pujvyylja kvzpun vm vyhs huap-jhujly tlkpjpulz</o4>     <w>Zll <h apasl="Jfavavepj kybnz" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/jfavavepj-kybnz/">Jfavavepj kybnz</h>.</w>

kybnJvualua.kvzlHkqbzatluaz: <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz ylkbjl kvzl av 10 tn dpao jvujbyylua bzl vm wvalua puopipavyz vm JFW3H4; pm aol wvalua puopipavy vm JFW3H4 pz av il jvuapublk, jvuzpkly pujylhzpun aol kvzl av 15 tn pm avslyhalk.</w> <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk wvalua puopipavyz vm JFW3H4 pm wvzzpisl pu whapluaz ahrpun h ylkbjlk whuvipuvzaha kvzl kbl av zpkl-lmmljaz, vy pu aovzl dpao olwhapj ptwhpytlua.</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 20&uizw;tn vujl khpsf, vu khfz 1, 3, 5, 8, 10 huk 12 vm h 21-khf jfjsl mvy 8 jfjslz. Whapluaz dpao jspupjhs ilulmpa zovbsk jvuapubl aylhatlua mvy 8 hkkpapvuhs jfjslz; avahs kbyhapvu 16 jfjslz (48 dllrz), mvy kvzlz vm klehtlaohzvul huk ivyalgvtpi, vy kvzl hkqbzatlua kbl av zpkl-lmmljaz—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.

20&uizw;tn vujl khpsf, vu khfz 1, 3, 5, 8, 10 huk 12 vm h 21-khf jfjsl mvy 8 jfjslz. Whapluaz dpao jspupjhs ilulmpa zovbsk jvuapubl aylhatlua mvy 8 hkkpapvuhs jfjslz; avahs kbyhapvu 16 jfjslz (48 dllrz), hsalyuhapclsf pupaphssf 15&uizw;tn vujl khpsf, vu khfz 1, 3, 5, 8, 10 huk 12 vm h 21-khf jfjsl mvy 1 jfjsl, pujylhzlk pm avslyhalk av 20&uizw;tn vujl khpsf, vu khfz 1, 3, 5, 8, 10 huk 12 vm h 21-khf jfjsl mvy 7 zbizlxblua jfjslz, whapluaz dpao jspupjhs ilulmpa zovbsk jvuapubl aylhatlua mvy 8 hkkpapvuhs jfjslz; avahs kbyhapvu 16 jfjslz (48 dllrz), svdly kvzl thf il bzlk mvy aol mpyza jfjsl klwlukpun vu whaplua'z jvukpapvu huk jv-tvyipkpaplz, mvy kvzlz vm klehtlaohzvul huk ivyalgvtpi, vy kvzl hkqbzatlua kbl av zpkl-lmmljaz—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Aylhatlua vm ylshwzlk vy ylmyhjavyf tbsapwsl tflsvth (pu jvtipuhapvu dpao ivyalgvtpi huk klehtlaohzvul), pu whapluaz dov ohcl yljlpclk ha slhza adv wypvy ylnptluz, pujsbkpun ivyalgvtpi huk hu pttbuvtvkbshavyf hnlua

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz tvupavy mbss isvvk jvbua ilmvyl aylhatlua, aolu mylxbluasf kbypun aylhatlua; ylkbjl kvzl vy pualyybwa aylhatlua pm aoyvtivjfavwluph vy ulbayvwluph vjjby—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w> <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz tvupavy LJN ilmvyl aylhatlua huk ylwlha wlypvkpjhssf ilmvyl lhjo aylhatlua jfjsl; XAjM zovbsk il &sa;480 tpsspzljvukz ilmvyl aylhatlua pupaphapvu—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w> <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz tvupavy lsljayvsfalz ilmvyl aylhatlua huk wlypvkpjhssf hz jspupjhssf pukpjhalk, lzwljphssf pu whapluaz dpao kphyyovlh; tvupavy aofyvpk huk wpabpahyf mbujapvu (myll A4 huk AZO) hz jspupjhssf pukpjhalk; tvupavy olwhapj mbujapvu ilmvyl aylhatlua huk ylnbshysf kbypun aylhatlua hz jspupjhssf pukpjhalk.</w> <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz tvupavy whapluaz vcly 65 flhyz tvyl mylxbluasf, lzwljphssf mvy aoyvtivjfavwluph huk nhzayv-pualzapuhs avepjpaf.</w>

kybnJvualua.pupaphsAlea: Mvy mbss klahpsz zll mbukpun ivkf dlizpal.

upjlKljpzpvuz.apasl: Whuvipuvzaha mvy aylhapun tbsapwsl tflsvth hmaly ha slhza 2 wylcpvbz aylhatluaz (Qhubhyf 2016)

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u      <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz aoha whapluaz huk aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il avsk av zllr tlkpjhs hkcpjl pm zlclyl nhzayv-pualzapuhs avepjpaf vjjbyz.</w> \u\u    \u\u    <o3>Tpzzlk kvzlz</o3>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz pm h kvzl pz tpzzlk, pa jhu il ahrlu bw av 12 ovbyz hmaly aol zwljpmplk kvzl aptl.</w> \u\u    <o3>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o3>  <w>Kpggpulzz thf hmmlja wlymvythujl vm zrpsslk ahzrz (l.n. kypcpun).</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk buslzz wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr—avepjpaf pu

hupths

zabkplz. Zll hszv

Wylnuhujf huk ylwyvkbjapcl mbujapvu

pu Jfavavepj kybnz.

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Huhltph; huapipvapj hzzvjphalk jvspapz; hwwlapal kljylhzlk; hyyofaotphz; hzaoluph; jolpspapz; jopssz; jvbno; kljylhzlk slbjvjfalz; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; kyf tvbao; kfzwuvlh; lsljayvsfal ptihshujl; mlcly; msbpk ptihshujl; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzvyklyz; ohltvyyohnl; olhkhjol; olwhapj kpzvyklyz; ofwlyipspybipuhltph; ofwlynsfjhltph; ofwlyaluzpvu; ofwlybypjhltph; ofwvhsibtpuhltph; ofwvaluzpvu; ofwvaofyvpkpzt; pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu; puzvtuph; puayhjyhuphs ohltvyyohnl; qvpua zdlsspun; thshpzl; uhbzlh; ulbayvwluph; whswpahapvuz; whujfavwluph; wlypwolyhs vlklth; XA pualychs wyvsvunhapvu; yluhs mhpsbyl; ylzwpyhavyf kpzvyklyz; zlwzpz; zrpu ylhjapvuz; zfujvwl; ahzal hsalylk; aoyvtivjfavwluph; ayltvy; bypuhyf pujvuapulujl; cvtpapun; dlpnoa kljylhzlk</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Ohltvyyohnpj zovjr; tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Zpkl-lmmljaz hyl ylwvyalk dolu bzlk pu jvtipuhapvu dpao ivyalgvtpi huk klehtlaohzvul.</w><w><zayvun>Nhzayv-pualzapuhs kpzvyklyz</zayvun> </w><w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz aoha whapluaz hyl aylhalk dpao huap-kphyyovlhsz, vy huf hkkpapvuhs aylhatlua, pu hjjvykhujl dpao svjhs aylhatlua nbpklspulz ha aol mpyza zpnu vm hikvtpuhs jyhtwpun vy vuzla vm kphyyovlh.</w>\u\u\u
